A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There were good things in this movie (Adam Driver's performance among them); and it was visually stunning; but I did not like where the current director took the overall Star Wars story ... recognize the universe does not revolve around me.  SPOILER-ish: Contact a couple of the Star Destroyers accompanying us and have them jump ahead in hyperspace to cut off the Resistance ships so we're not chasing them for hours on end burning up fuel and munitions ... just a thought.
